mapper.update: UPDATE SCM_FH_ShipmentsDatailMaster SET approvalId=#{approvalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approvalState=#{approvalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ownerId=#{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, businessDivision=#{businessDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, businessDivisionId=#{businessDivisionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province=#{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provinceId=#{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commerceName=#{commerceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commerceId=#{commerceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipmentsCode=#{shipmentsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, successDate=#{successDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createPersion=#{createPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate=#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE id=#{id}
